sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<record_update sys_domain="global" table="ecc_agent_script_include">
    <ecc_agent_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <active>true</active>
        <description>Pulled from global business rule "String Class Extensions".  This allows the MID Server to leverage extended JS String functions available on the instance.</description>
        <name>String</name>
        <script><![CDATA[String.prototype.startsWith =function(prefix){
   return (this.substr(0,prefix.length)==prefix);
}

String.prototype.endsWith = function(s) {
   if (!s)
      return false;
   
   if (this.length < s.length)
      return false;
   
   return (this.substr(this.length - s.length, s.length) == s);
}

String.prototype.trimLeft =function(){
   return this.replace(/^\s*/,"");
}

String.prototype.trimRight =function(){
   return this.replace(/\s*$/,"");
}

String.prototype.trim =function(){
   return this.trimRight().trimLeft();
}

String.prototype.replaceAll = function(from, to) {
   var str = this;
   from = from.replace(/([.*+?^=!:${}()|\[\]\/\\])/g, "\\$1");
   return str.replace(new RegExp(from, 'g'), to);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>ecc_agent_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>chris.nguyen</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2014-06-24 00:40:49</sys_created_on>
        <sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update>
        <sys_domain>global</sys_domain>
        <sys_id>373cd430c32121002d031f051eba8fa6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>String</sys_name>
        <sys_overrides/>
        <sys_package display_value="MID Server" source="com.glideapp.agent">a67620d04fa11200ea84cb4e0210c702</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name/>
        <sys_updated_by>chris.nguyen</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2014-06-24 19:57:46</sys_updated_on>
    </ecc_agent_script_include>
</record_update>
